description:
Tommy Norris is a grizzled oilman from Texas who has a low opinion of wind turbines and electric cars.  “You have any idea how much diesel you have to burn to mix that much concrete, or make that steel, and haul this shit out here and put it together with a 450-foot crane? You want […]

The post Anti-Renewable Influencers Parrot Takes from Fictional Series ‘Landman’ appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Anti-Renewable Influencers Parrot Takes from Fictional Series ‘Landman’

description:
Governments have been cautioned against adopting a new methane metric that is “incompatible” with climate science and “penalises” low-income countries. A statement issued by more than 60 civil society groups on Thursday (5 December) argued that a new standard known as Global Warming Potential Star (GWP*) to measure methane from livestock could “seriously undermine” efforts […]

The post Industry-backed Emissions Metric Could ‘Completely Derail’ Climate Action, Campaigners Warn appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Industry-backed Emissions Metric Could ‘Completely Derail’ Climate Action, Campaigners Warn

description:
A major Conservative donor and member of the House of Lords has made a series of recent speeches in Parliament that have lambasted the UK’s climate ambitions, while holding more than £300,000 in fossil fuel shares.  Tory peer Lord Moynihan of Chelsea has shares worth at least £100,000 in the fossil fuel giants Shell and […]

The post Tory Peer With Oil and Gas Investments Slams Climate Targets in House of Lords appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Tory Peer With Oil and Gas Investments Slams Climate Targets in House of Lords
